statements: UPDATE language_resources SET level_of_proficiency='Intermediate' WHERE resource_id=1001;

UPDATE language_resources SET level_of_proficiency = 'Advanced', is_public = TRUE WHERE language = 'Spanish' AND resource_name = 'Grammar Guide';
UPDATE language_resources SET resource_type = 'Video Course', is_public = FALSE, level_of_proficiency = 'Intermediate' WHERE resource_id = 5;
